attributes.action: To Deny Tony Blair any further Government Income
attributes.additional_details: Tony Blair is responsible as head of the past Governemnt for 10 years in destroying much that this country stands for and it is obvious he has used his seat of power for his own personal gains. Blair has done little since leaving 10 Downing Street except to line his own pockets. He should be released from Government employ and allowed to seek his own position in the private sector. Without Government backing Blair would not be in the position he is and he would not be toadying up to corrupt Governments in the Middle East.
